title: Hokandara Road,
details: RENT HOUSE IN THALAWATHUGODA ThalawathugodaHokandara Road, Two (2) Km to Thalawathugoda Junction, Close to Austrasia Sport complex and Diyawannawa jogging track. Facing to Paddy field in a beautiful environment. Two (2) storied house with swimming pool and rooftop. Four (4) bed rooms with attached bathroom (Hot water) and Air condition. Separate servant room and servant toilet facility. Parking space for vehicles. For rent: Contact No. 0772229062
